Html:
Hello,

What happens with libram of veracity that the healadin model says that its hps value is 0?

Thanks.

It's not modeled yet.  Specifically, procs off Holy Light aren't modeled.

It has a 70% chance to proc on holy light cast and a 10 second internal cooldown.  Since I cast Holy Light about 50% of the time, I have manually added the special effect to proc 35% on healing cast.  If you're a FoL or HoL spammer, adjust the value lower or higher as necessary, and you'll get a pretty good idea of how much mileage you'll get from it.
